articles.title: RBA Governor Bullock speaks on interest rate outlook after the 25 bps hike - FXStreet
articles.description: Reserve Bank of Australia (RBA) Governor Michele Bullock is addressing the press conference, explaining the reasons behind raising the benchmark interest rate by 25 basis points (bps) to 3.85% after the February monetary policy meeting.

articles.title: China bans hidden car door handles over safety concerns - BBC
articles.description: It makes China the first country to outlaw designs first popularised by Elon Musk's Tesla.

articles.title: Asian Stocks Set to Climb After US Data Lifts Mood: Markets Wrap - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Asian stocks climbed after their steepest two-day drop since April as markets found footing following sharp swings in gold and silver that sent ripples across assets. The precious metals rose in early trading.

articles.title: International companies cut off business in the U.S. because of ICE - The Washington Post
articles.description: French multinational Capgemini moved to distance itself “immediately” from ICE after criticism from French officials; a Canadian company has also canceled a sale to the agency.

articles.title: White House crypto meeting dug into stablecoin yield debate on market structure bill - CoinDesk
articles.description: Industry insiders met with Patrick Witt and others in President Donald Trump's administration to try to hash out the impasse over the Senate's crypto bill.

articles.title: Trump says DOJ should continue Fed Chair Powell probe 'to the end' - CNBC
articles.description: Sen. Thom Tillis said he would oppose any new Fed nominees until the Powell probe is resolved, the same day Trump announced Kevin Warsh as his Fed chair pick.

articles.title: Waymo raises $16B to scale robotaxi fleet internationally - TechCrunch
articles.description: Waymo said the funds will be used to fuel its growth, which has accelerated over the past year and doesn't appear to be slowing.

articles.description: Stocks finished higher on Monday as investors reacted to manufacturing data in January. President Trump said U.S. and India have reached trade deal.

articles.title: Con Ed blames salt spread after thousands lose power in Brooklyn - Gothamist
articles.description: Con Ed’s repair times are taking longer because of snow, ice and parked cars preventing access to key infrastructure.
